simplified_explanation.text: This poem is about a tiny kite who is scared to fly high at first.
simplified_explanation.originalText: A small kite is nervous to fly into the sky.

simplified_explanation.text: With encouragement, the little kite learns to be brave.
simplified_explanation.originalText: It becomes confident with the help of a bigger kite.

simplified_explanation.text: The poem teaches us that we can reach great heights if we try.
simplified_explanation.originalText: The message is to believe in yourself and aim high.

simplified_explanation.text: The little kite says it is scared to fly and thinks it will fall.
simplified_explanation.originalText: The small kite fears it cannot fly without falling.

simplified_explanation.text: The big kite encourages it to try and not give up.
simplified_explanation.originalText: A larger kite motivates it to be brave and attempt flying.

simplified_explanation.text: The little kite finally gathers courage to try a small flight.
simplified_explanation.originalText: The tiny kite slowly begins to move upward, feeling brave.

simplified_explanation.text: It wobbles at first but keeps going.
simplified_explanation.originalText: Though unsteady, it continues to rise.

simplified_explanation.text: The little kite climbs higher and feels excited.
simplified_explanation.originalText: As it rises more, joy replaces fear.

simplified_explanation.text: It sees the rooftops and trees below getting smaller.
simplified_explanation.originalText: The ground appears far away, which thrills the kite.

simplified_explanation.text: The little kite flies higher and higher into the sky.
simplified_explanation.originalText: The kite continues climbing confidently above everything.
It feels the excitement of flying freely.

simplified_explanation.text: The little kite is now proud and happy.
simplified_explanation.originalText: The kite feels proud of its bravery and success.

simplified_explanation.text: It shines brightly in the sky like a star.
simplified_explanation.originalText: It glitters in the sunlight high above.

simplified_explanation.text: The poem tells us to be brave and try new things even if they seem scary.
simplified_explanation.originalText: It encourages stepping past fear to achieve big dreams.

simplified_explanation.text: Just like the little kite, we can succeed if we believe in ourselves.
Proud: Feeling happy about something you did well.
simplified_explanation.originalText: Proud means joy in your achievements.

simplified_explanation.text: Wobble: To shake or move unsteadily.
simplified_explanation.originalText: To not stay steady while moving.

simplified_explanation.text: Courage: Being brave even when something feels scary.
simplified_explanation.originalText: Courage means facing fear with strength.

simplified_explanation.text: Adventure: An exciting journey or experience.
